Package geometries

Interface Intersectable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cylinder, Geometries, Geometry, Plane, Polygon, RadialGeometry, Sphere, Triangle, Tube
public interface Intersectable
In order to force geometry implement findIntersections()

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  Intersectable.GeoPoint
    static class By using Intersectable.GeoPoint we'll have access to all the shapes in Geometry and it'll help us later in Identify the shapes in the scene by a point

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> findIntersections​(Ray ray)
    the method calculate the intersection points on the Intersectable with a ray

  • Method Details

    • findIntersections

      java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> findIntersections​(Ray ray)
      the method calculate the intersection points on the Intersectable with a ray
      Parameters:
      ray - the given ray
      Returns:
      list of intersections as Point3D
